title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 11 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 11 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: In the LORD put I my trust: how say ye to my soul, Flee as a bird to your mountain?
lineList.cn: 我是投靠耶和华。你们怎吗对我说，你当像鸟飞往你的山去。

lineList.en: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow, they make ready their arrow upon the string, that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart.
lineList.cn: 看哪，恶人弯弓，把箭搭在弦上，要在暗中射那心里正直的人。

lineList.en: If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?
lineList.cn: 根基若毁坏，义人还能作什么呢。

lineList.en: The LORD is in his holy temple, the LORD's throne is in heaven: his eyes behold, his eyelids try, the children of men.
lineList.cn: 耶和华在他的圣殿里，耶和华的宝座在天上。他的慧眼察看世人。

lineList.en: The LORD trieth the righteous: but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth.
lineList.cn: 耶和华试验义人。惟有恶人和喜爱强暴的人，他心里恨恶。

lineList.en: Upon the wicked he shall rain snares, fire and brimstone, and an horrible tempest: this shall be the portion of their cup.
lineList.cn: 他要向恶人密布网罗。有烈火，琉璜，热风，作他们杯中的分。

lineList.en: For the righteous LORD loveth righteousness; his countenance doth behold the upright.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华是公义的。他喜爱公义。正直人必得见他的面。
